metadescription: dothiv. A dot making the difference.
examplecopy: The smallest billboard in the world to show your support for .hiv
herocopy: You are just in the right place to help! Copy the Javascript snippet below and raise awareness for the .hiv campaign and its fight against AIDS – by simply transforming every dot on your website pink!
generatorheadline: Customize the snippet by changing the defaults below
steponecopy: Hit Cmd + C to copy the code snippet below.
steptwocopy: Paste it just before the closing <body> tag.
stepthreecopy: Cheerio! You now help the fight against AIDS.
configurebutton: Does not float your boat? Customize it.
reassurancecomment:
/**
 * AUTHOR		dotHIV gemeinnuetziger e.V.
 * LICENSE		MIT
 * REPOSITORY		https://github.com/marionebl/dothivify
 * This snippet was used for a one day campaign for .hiv turning all website dots pink.
 * It’s time guarded for DEC 1st of 2014. When over, you can delete it.
 **/

defaults.headline: A dot makes the difference.
defaults.text: Help with your own .hiv domain and be part of the .hiv movement.
